sentences.en: Ability to get along with people is an asset in business.
sentences.cn: 在商业界善跟别人相处是可贵的优点.

sentences.en: Asset can be divided into tangible and intangible assets.
sentences.cn: asset:资产可分为有形和无形资产.

sentences.en: Good health is a great asset.
He is a great asset to our company.
sentences.cn: 他是我们公司的宝贵人才.

sentences.en: He is a most valuable asset to the firm.
He'll do your bidding, and for that his blindness is his chief asset.
sentences.cn: 他按照你的吩咐行事, 因此盲目成了他的主要财富.

sentences.en: Jumps in asset prices risk causing premature inflation jitters.
sentences.cn: 资产价格激增的风险会引发通胀恐慌的提前爆发.

sentences.en: Language is a wonderful asset and we should be using it well. "
sentences.cn: 语言是一种宝贵的财富,我们应很好地加以使用. ”

sentences.en: She'll be an asset to the team.
Sociability is a great asset to a salesman.
sentences.cn: 善交际是推销员的一大本钱.

sentences.en: The desire to advance of a youth is an asset of great value.
sentences.cn: 青年人的上进心是十分可贵的.

sentences.en: The firm has an important asset in the person of the director of research.
sentences.cn: 公司有一巨大财富,就是研究部主任这个人.

sentences.en: The tennis player's speed is his great asset.
sentences.cn: 那个网球运动员动作迅速,这是他的一大优势.

sentences.en: the value of a company’s assets
There were still some excessively high speciallylevels of investment especially asset investments.
sentences.cn: 投资特别是房地产方面的投资出奇的高.

phrases.tran_cn: 标的资产；基础资产；相关/指定资产

trans.tran_en: the things that a company owns, that can be sold to pay debts
